quotes.quote: If you turn your eyes away from sad things, they'll happen again one day. If you keep running away, you'll keep repeating the same mistakes. That's why you have to face the truth straight on.
Fragility is always lurking behind our peaceful day-to-day life. Terrible things don’t only happen in places far beyond our reach.
Nothing good can come by rejecting yourself.
There are people in this world who don't understand that what they consider a harmless prank can deeply hurt someone else.

Anything can happen. No one ever thinks it will until it does. What will happen, happens. That's how the world is. The most important thing is to not let the tragedy defeat you. To believe that you can get through it.
People can never truly understand each other! That's why we communicate and try to understand. We can only understand ourselves through being with others!
There are all sorts of mysteries in this world, like snacks and candy and sweets falling from the sky!
Losing something is sad. Even when I lose something as tiny as a worn-out eraser, I feel pretty down for a day or two. That's why I'm looking for him.
No matter what, I’ll be always be your friend. No matter how far you go, I’ll be thinking about you everyday.
Love requires no reason. That is what makes it love!
It may be better to go and regret it rather than staying here and regretting it. If you don’t move forward, you can’t gain anything.

A peaceful every day life hides its fragility. Fear and violence aren't just something in another world, completely unrelated to us. If a disaster happens, we can't change it. But as long as we small gears are linked together, we can keep moving forward, even if it's only one small step at a time.
If the world is full of things we never wanted to know, is our only option to look away? You won't solve anything by looking away.
Every story has an ending. One day, we won’t be able to stay together.
I’m a very lucky person. I was able to meet people I love.
I don’t mind getting in trouble. But I won’t let my friends' kindness go to waste.

[Talking to Riki] We've spent time together that made our hearts dance. But every story has to come to an end. No one can stay a kid forever. Time passes, and people grow up. There will come a day when we will no longer be together.
